nodes.name: createCloneToken

devdoc.details: This contract is used to generate clone contracts from a contract.  In solidity this is the way to create a contract from a contract of the  same class

params._decimalUnits: Number of decimals of the new token
params._parentToken: Address of the token being cloned
params._snapshotBlock: Block of the parent token that will  determine the initial distribution of the clone token
params._tokenSymbol: Token Symbol for the new token
params._transfersEnabled: If true, tokens will be able to be transferred

createCloneToken(address,uint256,string,.return: The address of the new token contract

createCloneToken(address,uint256,string,.notice: Update the DApp by creating a new token with new functionalities  the msg.sender becomes the controller of this clone token
